dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Social Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically participate in group discussions, sharing ideas and engaging with others.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe from the sidelines, listening and gathering information before contributing.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively and forcefully address conflicts, sometimes at the expense of others' feelings.
Your FarTwin will listen attentively to opposing views, seeking common ground and compromise.

dimensions.label: Intellectual Curiosity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically seek out new knowledge and experiences, often taking on complex challenges.
Your FarTwin will approach learning with caution, relying on established facts and avoiding new ideas or perspectives.
Your FarTwin will meticulously examine details, ensuring accuracy and precision in their work.
Your FarTwin will take a high-level approach, focusing on the big picture rather than getting bogged down in minor details.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will generate innovative and imaginative ideas, often thinking outside the box.
Your FarTwin will focus on practical applications and execution, rather than exploring new ideas or concepts.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically analyze data and information, seeking to understand underlying patterns and trends.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and gut feelings, making decisions based on a sense of what feels right or wrong.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges and risks, often pushing beyond their comfort zone.
Your FarTwin will prefer to avoid uncertainty and risk, opting for stability and predictability instead.
